text: Well made and affordable congee along with soup offering. A rare find these days in a space occupied by syndicated food providers.

This is not the only stall selling porridge nor fish soup in the hawker center but there are always queues at this stall. Only non-fried fish is available for the soup and no option to add any milk, but all these never reduce the crowds. The soup is cooked on the spot upon the order is received. Tried out the fish soup once and the taste is above average! There is option to serve with rice, noodles etc. Price wise is competitive,  4.5sgd for soup and top up 0.5sgd for rice or noodles.
Taste of the porridge is good, well cooked to a soft and moist texture.
Pork porridge is light and a healthier choice of breakfast.
Always here to get the fish porridge, a lot of ingredients and my boys love it. Whether when they are well or unwell, this is our comfort food!
